adDetails: Fully Customized Event & Wedding Photography / Photographer We also do Portraits and Senior Portraits. We do both packages and hourly. Ask us about our variety of discounts and current rates. Fully and INDIVIDUALLY Edited pictures. This ensures good color and contrast in each picture. WE DO NOT OVERBOOK SO MORE TIME IS SPENT ON YOUR WEDDING. "AFTER WEDDING PAYMENT" options available. Fully Customized Event Photography $ Reasonable Rates / Variety of Packages Request a free quote: www.photo.naqiyadesigns.com/contact.html We offer fully edited wedding, event and architectural photography and videography services. We fully customize our images to match your particular "look" and "style". We provide free consultations. We have packages to meet your needs and wants. We also do VIDEOGRAPHY. All regular investments hours and packages include: - Watermark-free - Full resolution (300 dpi) .jpg pictures - Color-corrected - Printing rights - Unlimited pictures taken - Online gallery with slideshow capabilities (link to share with family/friends) I offer beautiful albums, prints, gallery-style canvas wraps, save the dates, announcements, etc. Let's get together for coffee, tea or other drinks and get to know each other as we discuss your wedding day plans. Variety of rates for a variety of budgets and needs. LINKS: *Website- http://www.naqiyadesigns.com *Facebook- http://https://www.facebook.com/naqiyadesigns *Galleries- www.naqiyadesigns.zenfolio.com REVIEWS: *Best San Francisco Weddings and Best Carmel Weddings- http://www.bestsanfranciscoweddings.com/naqiya-designs-photo--video/975962fa5b2356e6-page5.html *WeddingWire Reviews- http://www.weddingwire.com/biz/naqiya-designs-photo-video-san-jose/975962fa5b2356e6.html *WedFolio- http://wedfol.io/pages/naqiya-designs-san-jose-ca/34008/ *Mitzvah Wire- http://www.mitzvahwire.com/biz/naqiya-designs-photo-video-san-jose-ca/975962fa5b2356e6/portfolio *Event Wire- http://www.eventwire.com/b/naqiya-designs-photo-video-san-jose-ca/975962fa5b2356e6/reviews/1?review_type=wedding *Wedding Book- http://www.weddingbook.com/wedding-videographers/san-jose-ca/naqiya-designs-photo-video-production We also do Video!
